issue.title: javadoc generation fails with java 8
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-930](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-930). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Workaround: use java 7
